articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Songdowon General Foodstuff Factory
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae Inspects Songdowon General Foodstuff Factory
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Choe Ryong Hae, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK and vice-chairman of the C.C., WPK, inspected the Songdowon General Foodstuff Factory.
					 Going round the factory, he gave pep-talks to its employees striving to modernize the production processes and operating the equipment at full capacity.
					
					 He stressed the importance of the factory's role in improving the provincial people's standard of living, and urged it to produce more world-famous products and commodities in reliance on locally available raw material resources.
					
					 Choe also inspected the Kalma Foodstuff Factory associated with the feats of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He called on the factory to thoroughly implement the Party's intention for providing the people with tasty processed fish.

articles.title: Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks for This Year
articles.content:
Meetings Held to Vow to Implement Tasks for This Year
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place at units of pace-setting and major industrial sectors of the national economy in the DPRK to carry out the tasks advanced by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 The reporters and speakers at the meetings noted that the Supreme Leader in his New Year Address reviewed the work of 2017 which marked an immortal milestone in the history of building a powerful socialist country with the spirit of self-reliance and self-development as the dynamic force and comprehensively indicated the tasks and ways for this year.
					
					 They stressed the need for all the officials, party members and working people to make steady miracles and innovations at every worksite of the vanguard sectors and major industrial sectors of the national economy through an all-out general offensive, in hearty response to the militant call of the Party and thus demonstrate the indomitable mental power and brave mettle of the heroic Kim Il Sung-Kim Jong Il working class.

articles.title: Youths and Women Vow to Carry through Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
articles.content:
Youths and Women Vow to Carry through Tasks Set Forth in New Year Address
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Members of the youth vanguard and women's union officials and members met at the Youth Park Open-Air Theatre and the plaza of the Tower of the Juche Idea here on Monday to vow to carry through the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Reports were made at the meetings to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporters and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's New Year Address serves as the militant banner redoubling the firm faith in the revolutionary victory enshrined in the hearts of the people and encouraging them to ceaselessly work fresh miracles through a great campaign for creating the Mallima speed.
					
					 They stressed that all the youths should become the first-line death-defying corps in defending the leader to make a breakthrough for advance in building a powerful socialist country and the first-line standard-bearers devotedly implementing the Party's policy.
					
					 They also contended that the women's union officials and members should devote their patriotism in such major construction projects of the country as the construction of the Wonsan-Kalma coastal tourist area, the renovation of Samjiyon County, the construction of the Tanchon Power Station and the second-stage waterway project in South Hwanghae Province. And they underscored the need to fully display the militant power and might of the women's union on all fronts for building a powerful socialist nation this year.

articles.title: More Pledge-making Rallies Held
articles.content:
More Pledge-making Rallies Held
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Rallies took place in Kangwon, North and South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces and Rason City to vow to carry out the tasks set forth by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address. 
					 Present there were officials of local party and power organs, working people's organizations, industrial establishments, farms, universities and other units and working people, youth and students.
					
					 The reporters and speakers there said that the Supreme Leader's New Year Address is the important guidelines enhancing optimism and faith in the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche and indicating the bright path to it and a militant banner encouraging the army and people to the grand Mallima advance.
					
					 They appealed to all the officials, party members and other working people to speed up the drive for strengthening the independence and Juche character of the national economy and improving the people's standard of living as required by the revolutionary counteraction strategy set forth at the 2nd Plenary Session of the 7th Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					
					 They stressed the need to make uninterrupted innovations and progress, rallied closer around the Party until the final victory of the revolution is won by carrying forward the tradition of the heroic struggle and collective innovation established in the course of state-building and development of Juche Korea.
					
					 At the end of the meetings there were mass demonstrations.

articles.title: Winter Camping Begins at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
articles.content:
Winter Camping Begins at Songdowon Int'l Children's Camp
 Wonsan, January 8 (KCNA) -- The first batch of winter campers began camping with due ceremony at the Songdowon International Children's Camp on Monday.
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned, officials and teaching staff of the Camp and campers.
					
					 The reporter and speakers there called upon all the officials, teaching staff and campers to grasp and glorify the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un for the camp.
					
					 They said that the teaching staff should well organize the camping activities with main stress put on cultivating the schoolchildren's sense of organization, independence and collectivism and take warm care of the campers' life.
					
					 They stressed that the campers should possess noble moral traits and collectivism and train their physical bodies while brushing up their knowledge.

articles.title: New Year Performance of Schoolchildren Goes On
articles.content:
New Year Performance of Schoolchildren Goes On
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A New Year performance of schoolchildren for Juche 107 (2018) is going on at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace here.
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as small chorus "Thank You, Generalissimo Kim Il Sung" and male solo and pangchang "Let's Sing More Loudly the Song of General Kim Jong Il".
					
					 The performers impressively sang of the happiness of the Korean schoolchildren who have enjoyed all blessings under the care of the Party, holding the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the eternal sun.
					
					 They well represented respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's warm love for posterity.
					
					 There were also numbers dealing with the pride of the schoolchildren who are growing up to be masters of a sci-tech power and skillful revolutionary talents and pillars of thriving Korea.
					
					 Among the audience were working people of various circles and school youth and children in the city of Pyongyang, overseas compatriots and foreign guests.

articles.title: Embodiment of Fixed Will of Reunification and Love for Nation
articles.content:
Embodiment of Fixed Will of Reunification and Love for Nation
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un clarified bold and compatriotic stand and proposal for improving inter-Korean relations in his New Year Address.
					 This is the expression of the respected Supreme Leader's fixed will for national reunification and noble love for nation to improve inter-Korean relations and achieve a breakthrough for independent reunification by the efforts of the nation.
					
					 It is the fixed will of the Supreme Leader for national reunification to accomplish the cause of independent reunification of the country true to lifelong intention and behest of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The Supreme Leader put forward the line of independent reunification of the country on the basis of the Juche-oriented idea and line of national reunification set forth by the great leaders and their undying feats in conformity with the requirements of complicated situation and changing times and saw to it that the driving force for national reunification were consolidated, thus ensuring that the struggle for national reunification would be launched on a fresh higher stage.
					
					 He provided a sure guarantee for the independent reunification of the nation by making sure that the DPRK possessed powerful war deterrent capable of smashing any enemy at a strike with his indomitable will and do-or-die struggle in the face of the hostile forces' vicious challenges of aggression and moves to isolate and stifle the DPRK.
					
					 National reunification is the most urgent and vital task facing the Korean nation.
					
					 The Korean nation has suffered the pain of division for 70-odd years owing to outsiders' persistent ambition for aggression and anti-reunification moves by warmongers at home and abroad, and exposed to the constant threat of war in the biggest hotspot in the world.
					
					 If the Korean nation which has eagerly aspired after national reunification for a long period fails to achieve a breakthrough for national reunification at an early date, the country's reunification will be a long way to go and the danger of permanent division will further increase in this land.
					
					 In view of the prevailing situation on the Korean peninsula and the fundamental interests of the Korean nation and the trend of the times, the New Year Address reflecting the peerlessly great man's firm will for reunification and warm love for nation has touched heartstring of all the fellow countrymen wishing for peace and reunification.
					
					 All the people in the north and the south and abroad will have to more vigorously turn out in the patriotic, sacred struggle for making a fresh history of national reunification by smashing the moves of anti-reunification forces at home and abroad with concerted efforts of the nation, true to Kim Jong Un's steadfast idea of national independence, firm will for national reunification and noble love for nation.

articles.title: Banner of National Independence Should Be Held Higher
articles.content:
Banner of National Independence Should Be Held Higher
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- It is the stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government to write a new history of national reunification, holding high the banner of national independence.
					 National independence is the fundamental principle to be adhered to in settling the affairs of the nation.
					
					 A nation is responsible for its internal affairs and has the force to propel their settlement.
					
					 The north-south relations are an internal affair of the Korean nation in any respect, a matter to be settled by the concerted efforts of the north and the south.
					
					 All problems arising between the north and the south should be settled on the principle of By the Korean Nation Itself from A to Z.
					
					 The Korean nation is no longer a weak one that had been subject to ruin and division after being deprived of its sovereignty by foreign forces, and it has grown to be a resourceful and powerful one capable of attaining national reunification and carving out its destiny by itself.
					
					 There is no problem unsolvable if the Korean nation has the transparent view and stance and firm courage and self-confidence to solve the issue of the nation, the issue of reunification.
					
					 To maintain national independence is a bitter lesson drawn from the long-standing history of national division.
					
					 The outsiders who enforced division on the Korean nation never present the reunification to it. And they will never wish to see the Korean nation getting strong through reunification.
					
					 The Korean nation's affair, the matter of reunification, can never be settled with any others' approval or help.
					
					 The Koreans should only worship their nation and trust its might and discuss the issue of national reunification with their fellow countrymen.
					
					 The more complicated and acute the situation on the Korean Peninsula gets, the more firmly the Korean nation should adhere to the principle of independence in settling its internal affairs, the issue of national reunification.
					
					 All compatriots in the north and the south of Korea and abroad should never allow outsiders' interference and tyranny to keep the Korean nation divided forever and dominate the Korean Peninsula and the region, but settle the national issue, the issue of reunification, in line with the independent demands of the nation on the principle of national self-determination.

articles.title: Successes Made in Chemical Industry Last Year
articles.content:
Successes Made in Chemical Industry Last Year
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address said that prospects were opened up for consolidating the independent foundations of the chemical industry and attaining the five-year strategy's goal for the output of chemical products.
					 Great achievements were made in the field of chemical industry last year, a year of weighty significance in implementing the five-year strategy for national economic development.
					
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex manufactured more than 20 diaphragm electrolyzers in cooperation with scientific research institutes to establish the process for producing caustic soda.
					
					 The Namhung Youth Chemical Complex increased gas producer and put steam boilers into normal operation so as to further raise the productivity of Juche fertilizer.
					
					 The Hungnam Fertilizer Complex newly manufactured and installed equipment like steam boiler, water cooling apparatus and pump and pushed forward the project for expanding fertilizer production capacity based on anthracite gasification at the final stage, thus opening up a bright prospect for increasing production with locally available materials.
					
					 The Salt Industry Guidance Bureau and the Namyang Salt Works under the Ministry of Chemical Industry completed a large-capacity salt production process based on underground ultra-saline water and the Ponghwa Chemical Factory laid a solid foundation for boosting the production of various kinds of chemical goods.
					
					 Remarkable success was also registered in establishing the C1 chemical industry.
					
					 In hearty response to the New Year Address of the respected Supreme Leader on making a breakthrough in reenergizing the overall economic front this year, officials and workers in the field of chemical industry are determined to launch a revolutionary general offensive to achieve fresh victory this year, too.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. for Aggravating Situation on Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Slams U.S. for Aggravating Situation on Korean Peninsula
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The United States is still aggravating the situation on the Korean Peninsula.
					 It seeks to convene in Canada in the middle of January foreign and defense ministerial meetings of those countries which took part in the Korean War. The meetings are targeted against the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 The Slovak internet paper Topki and Japanese Kyodo News quoted U.S. Secretary of State Tillerson as saying that the purpose of the meetings is to send a joint message of the world not allowing north Korea's nuclear possession and that the pressure upon it would be intensified.
					
					 The U.S. behavior attempting to internationally incite atmosphere of sanctions and pressure against the DPRK from the beginning of the year is a dangerous farce to steadily aggravate the situation on the Peninsula and in the region.
					
					 The DPRK's proactive step and sincere efforts from the beginning of the year command full support and deep sympathy at home and abroad.
					
					 However, the U.S. which does not wish peace and stability of the Peninsula is now uneasy and restless.
					
					 Last year the U.S. conducted the largest-ever nuclear war exercises on the Peninsula one after another in a desperate way to impose a heinous nuclear disaster upon mankind.
					
					 Lunatic Trump blustered that "even if a war breaks out, it will be fought on the Korean Peninsula and even though thousands are killed, they will be there, not in the U.S. mainland," crying out for "total destruction" of the DPRK and "extermination" of its population. This year, too, he is running high fever in nuclear blackmail and threat to the DPRK over twitter.
					
					 Even now he is busy calling upon the vassal forces that took part in the Korean War of aggression for a confab for a new war just as the U.S. did in the 1950s.
					
					 All the facts clearly show who is the chieftain of aggravating the tension on the Peninsula and who is the disturber of global peace and stability.
					
					 History repeats itself.
					
					 The U.S. and its vassal forces, which failed to subjugate the Korean people armed with rifles, are making desperate efforts to ignite a new war again, oblivious of the disgraceful history of defeat.
					
					 The U.S. had better clearly see the entity of the DPRK which rapidly emerged a strategic state.
					
					 As a responsible, peace-loving nuclear power, the DPRK will neither have recourse to nuclear weapons unless hostile forces of aggression violate its sovereignty and interests, but it will resolutely respond to acts of wrecking peace and security on the Peninsula.
					
					 The more the U.S. runs amuck with the uncontrollable danger, the earlier "the only superpower" will meet its miserable end.
					
					 The satellite forces would be well advised to bear in mind that they will bitterly regret for their behaviors, if they run helter-skelter depending on the U.S. dashing toward the ruin.

articles.title: Papers on DPRK Foreign Policy Stand
articles.content:
Papers on DPRK Foreign Policy Stand
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The foreign policy stand of the Workers' Party of Korea and the DPRK government, clarified by respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address, serves as highly important guidelines that should be consistently adhered to in further enhancing the dignity of the DPRK and its international influence and expanding the relations with other countries on the initiative, say the DPRK leading newspapers in articles Monday.
					 The validity of the external policy idea and stand of the WPK and the DPRK government is clearly proved by the fact that the DPRK has developed the external relations while reliably defending its social system and sovereignty and displaying its dignity in any adversity, says Rodong Sinmun, adding:
					
					 Our Party and the DPRK government have steadily developed the good-neighborly, friendly and cooperative relations with all countries that respect our national sovereignty and are friendly to us, transcending differences in ideology and social system. They have also improved the relations with those countries which had been hostile toward the DPRK in the past but want to develop the relations with the DPRK after repenting of their past wrongdoings.
					
					 It is thanks to the independent external policy of the great leaders that our country established diplomatic relations with scores of countries over the past three decades; joined many international and regional bodies; expanded and developed economic and cultural exchanges with many countries including capitalist countries and strengthened the bonds and solidarity with the world progressives advocating independence and justice.
					
					 It is the stand of the DPRK government to play the role of the vanguard steering the building of a new world, just and peaceful, and the master of propelling the world revolution.
					
					 Minju Joson says that our Republic will as ever develop good-neighborly and friendly relations with all countries that respect its sovereignty and are friendly toward it, and make positive efforts to build a just and peaceful new world.

articles.title: Proper Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue Demanded
articles.content:
Proper Settlement of Sexual Slavery Issue Demanded
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The "study society on comfort women for the Imperial Japanese Army", composed of intellectuals of south Korea and different countries, on Jan. 3 made public a statement in demand of proper settlement of the issue of sexual slavery for the Imperial Japanese Army, according to the south Korean internet paper Tongil News.
					 The statement said the south Korea-Japan "agreement" on the sexual slavery issue in December 2015 was one denying the essence of the issue and violating the history of the efforts for the settlement.
					
					 Referring to the disclosure of the wrong procedure and contents of the "agreement" on the sexual slavery on Dec. 27 last year, the statement said the humiliating "agreement" with Japan, which denied the essence of the sexual slavery issue and history and attempted to erase the issue forever, cannot be a settlement.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to press for legal responsibility of the Japanese government for the sexual slavery and Japan to bear legal responsibility for the issue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported in DR Congo
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Reported in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of DR Congo carried on its bulletin respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's New Year Address.

articles.title: 100th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk Celebrated in Russia
articles.content:
100th Birth Anniversary of Kim Jong Suk Celebrated in Russia
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- There took place a celebration, seminar and concert in Russia on Dec. 22 and 23 last year to mark the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 On display at the venues of the events were works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, and books dealing with the revolutionary career and exploits of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 Present there were Russian politicians and figures and masses and the DPRK ambassador to Russia and his embassy members.
					
					 V. A. Petrov, chairman of the Russian committee for revering great persons of Mt Paektu, said that Kim Jong Suk is praised as the great mother of Korea as she performed great exploits for the country and the people.
					
					 Zhukova, first vice-chairwoman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, noted that as a woman she regarded it as a great pride that the great woman just like Kim Jong Suk was registered in the history of humankind.
					
					 Elena Bavichi, chairwoman of the Kim Jong Suk Women's Union of Russia, said that Kim Jong Suk's exploits will be forever kept in the hearts of not only the Korean people but also the world progressive people as she set a noble example in defending the leader unto death and devoted her all to the country and the people.
					
					 The concert climaxed with immortal classic "My Mother" and songs "Footstep" and "Charms".

articles.title: UNSC "Sanctions Resolution" Flayed in France, Nepal
articles.content:
UNSC "Sanctions Resolution" Flayed in France, Nepal
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- A French political party and a Nepalese figure bitterly slammed another "sanctions resolution" cooked up by the U.S. at the UNSC.
					 The Revolutionary Communist Party of France, in a solidarity message "We oppose the criminal resolution together with the DPRK and Korean people" made public on Dec. 26 last year, said:
					
					 The UNSC "sanctions resolution" is an attempt to bring the Korean people to their knees, pursuant to the U.S. committing crimes against humanity.
					
					 The UNSC submitted to the U.S., which is threatening other countries in breach of the UN resolutions and is the only country that used nuclear weapons in the world.
					
					 "Nuclear threats" from the DPRK is a lie.
					
					 Any country cannot force its demands down the throat of the DPRK, an independent state.
					
					 The DPRK will never surrender.
					
					 It is the U.S. that divided the Korean peninsula, ignited a war of aggression against the DPRK and continues committing moves hostile to it.
					
					 We appeal to all peace-loving forces to intensify solidarity movement with the Korean people.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, made public the following statement on Dec. 27 last year:
					
					 We strongly censure the U.S. for fabricating another "sanctions resolution" against the DPRK over its successful test-launch of ICBM Hwasong-15.
					
					 We urge the U.S. to repeal its hostile policy towards the DPRK and immediately stop inhuman acts of ruining the life of the Korean people.
					
					 We back the steps for self-defense being taken by the DPRK to protect its sovereignty and global peace.
					
					 The DPRK is sure to win in the standoff with the U.S.

articles.title: Workers' Party of DR Congo Signs Pyongyang Declaration
articles.content:
Workers' Party of DR Congo Signs Pyongyang Declaration
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of DR Congo signed the Pyongyang Declaration "Let Us Defend and Advance the Cause of Socialism."
					 At an emergency special meeting of the party held on Jan. 2 the Pyongyang Declaration was read out and then signed by National President of the party Steve Mbikayi Mabuluki.
					
					 The special secretary of the national president conveyed the signed document to the DPRK mission, quoting the national president as saying to sign the Pyongyang Declaration shows that the Workers' Party of DR Congo wishes Chairman Kim Jong Un good health in the New Year, too, and bigger victory in the building a powerful socialist nation, and the party's support for his historic New Year Address and the will to develop the friendly and cooperative relations between the two parties aspiring after socialism.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Mexican Political Party Leader
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's New Year Address Supported by Mexican Political Party Leader
 Pyongyang, January 8 (KCNA) -- I extend invariable solidarity to the just cause of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean people, expressing full support for all the lines and policies set forth by respected Comrade Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address.
					 Jesus Antonio Carlos Hernandez, general secretary of the Central Committee of the People's Socialist Party of Mexico, said this in a statement on Jan. 3. He went on:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Un, Supreme Leader of the Korean people, said in his New Year Address that the DPRK has at last come to possess a powerful and reliable war deterrent, which no force and nothing can reverse, by conducting tests of various means of nuclear delivery and super-intense thermonuclear weapon, and that its nuclear forces constitute a powerful deterrent that prevents the United States from starting an adventurous war.
					
					 He clarified major tasks and ways for enhancing the independence and Juche character of national economy and improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 He offered a blitzkrieg and bold proposal for easing the acute military tension between the north and the south, create a peaceful environment on the Korean peninsula and establish a climate favorable for national reconciliation and reunification. This enjoys warm welcome from the world peace-loving progressive people.
					
					 I sincerely congratulate the heroic Korean people on winning a brilliant victory in the standoff with the U.S. imperialists by accomplishing the great, historic cause of perfecting the national nuclear forces.
					
					 I hope that the DPRK would achieve bigger successes in the struggle for building a powerful country and improving the people's standard of living this year, too.

articles.title: Choe Ryong Hae dirige el Combinado de Alimentos de Songdowon
articles.content:
Choe Ryong Hae dirige el Combinado de Alimentos de Songdowon
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Choe Ryong Hae, miembro del Presidium del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y vicepresidente del Comite de Estado de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y del Comite Central del PTC, dirigio en el terreno las gestiones del Combinado de Alimentos de Songdowon.
					Recorriendo varios puntos, Choe estimulo a los empleados que ponen en pleno funcionamiento todas las instalaciones promoviendo la modernizacion de los procesos de produccion y mejorando con escrupulosidad la gestion y la operacion.
					
					Dio enfasis en la importancia de la mision de la fabrica para el mejoramiento de la vida de la poblacion de la provincia y en la necesidad de incrementar la produccion y suministro de las mercancias de competitividad con las materias primas abundantes en la localidad. 
					
					Acto seguido, estuvo en la Fabrica de Alimentos de Kalma donde estan impregnadas las huellas de orientacion del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					
					Insistio en llevar a la realidad el proposito del Partido de suministrar los pescados procesados a los habitantes.

articles.title: Efectuados mitines de juramento en unidades importantes de economia nacional
articles.content:
Efectuados mitines de juramento en unidades importantes de economia nacional
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en las unidades de los dominios priorizados y de rama de la industria importante de la economia nacional los mitines de juramento para cumplir las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo por el Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					  En las ocasiones hubo informes e intervenciones.
					
					  Los oradores subrayaron que en su Mensaje del Ano Nuevo el Maximo Dirigente hizo balance del 2017 en que con la capacidad de fortalecerse con sus propios medios como fuerza motriz, marcaron rememorables hitos para la historia de la edificacion de la potencia socialista y aclaro globalmente las tareas combativas de este ano y los remedios para cumplirlo.
					
					  Exhortaron a todos los funcionarios, militantes del Partido y los trabajadores a crear continuos milagros e innovaciones en todos los lugares de combate de los dominios priorizados y los de la industria importante de la economia nacional mediante la ofensiva general de todo el pueblo segun el llamamiento combativo del Partido y a ostentar a todo el mundo la potencia espiritual indoblegable y el temperamento valiente de la heroica clase obrera de Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Efectuados mitines de juramento de jovenes y mujeres
articles.content:
Efectuados mitines de juramento de jovenes y mujeres
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar hoy en el Anfiteatro del Parque Juventud y la explanada frente al Monumento a la Idea Juche, respectivamente, los mitines de juramento de vanguardias juveniles y de funcionarias e integrantes de la Union Socialista de Mujeres de Corea para  cumplir las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					En las ocasiones hubo informes e intervenciones.
					
					Los oradores apuntaron que el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente deviene la bandera combativa que hace a los jovenes redoblar la ferrea conviccion en la victoria de la revolucion y seguir creando nuevos mitos de la juventud heroica en la campana de creacion de la velocidad de Mallima. 
					
					Llamaron a todos los jovenes a ser el primer peloton suicida de defensa al lider y el abanderado no.1 en la materializacion de las politicas del Partido para abrir brecha en la construccion de la potencia socialista.
					
					Subrayaron que las funcionarias e integrantes de la USMC deben hacer contribucion patriotica en los campos de obras importantes como la construccion de la zona turistica costera Wonsan-Kalma, el acondicionamiento del distrito de Samjiyon, la edificacion de la Central Hidroelectrica de Tanchon y la segunda etapa del canal de riego en la provincia de Hwanghae del Sur. 
					
					Enfatizaron la necesidad de manifestar sin reservas este ano el poderio de la USMC en todos los dominios de la construccion de la potencia socialista.

articles.title: Efectuados en localidades mitines por cumplir tareas presentadas en Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
articles.content:
Efectuados en localidades mitines por cumplir tareas presentadas en Mensaje de Ano Nuevo
Pyongyang, 8 de enero (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar en las provincias de Kangwon, Hamgyong del Norte y el Sur y Ryanggang y en la ciudad de Rason los mitines multitudinarios para cumplir las tareas presentadas en el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente Kim Jong Un.
					Asistieron a las ocasiones los funcionarios de los organismos del Partido y el Poder, entidades de masas, fabricas, empresas, granjas, universidades, etc., asi como los trabajadores, los jovenes y estudiantes, de las respectivas localidades.
					
					En los mitines hubo informes y discursos de juramento.
					
					Los oradores dijeron que el Mensaje del Ano Nuevo del Maximo Dirigente es la guia programatica que da la conviccion y optimismo sobre la victoria final y ilumina el camino deslumbrante y la bandera estimulante que llama a todos los militares y civiles coreanos al gran avance de Mallima.
					
					Insistieron en que todos los funcionarios, militantes del Partido y trabajadores deben desarrollar con dinamismo la campana para destacar el caracter independiente y autoctono de la economia nacional de acuerdo con la exigencia de la estrategia de la respuesta revolucionaria presentada en el II Pleno del VII Periodo del CC del Partido y para mejorar la vida de la poblacion.
					
					  Llamaron a todos a unirse compactamente en torno al Partido para seguir innovando y avanzando hasta alcanzar la victoria final de la revolucion, llevando adelante las tradiciones de la gesta heroica y la innovacion colectiva registradas en la historia de la construccion y el desarrollo de la Corea del Juche.
					
					  Acto seguido, hubo marchas masivas.
